mapper.sql: device_id, device_name, device_code, device_model, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_delete
mapper.update: update tb_device set is_delete = 1 where device_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_device
device_id,
device_name,
device_code,
device_model,
create_user,
create_time,
update_user,
update_time,
is_delete,

mapper.update:
update tb_device
device_name = #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_model = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from tb_device where is_delete = 0 ORDER BY create_time desc
